snippet: Responding to the discovery, the Israeli military said it had suspended the flow of building materials into Gaza because the tunnel could have been used for an attack against soldiers or civilians.
abstract: Israeli military announces discovery of tunnel leading from Gaza into Israel that could have been used to attack Israeli soldiers or civilians; military says it will suspend flow of building materials to private sector in Gaza because Hamas has been using materials approved by Israel for civilian purposes to build such tunnels; materials for projects overseen by international organizations will continue to approved for transfer.

byline.contributor: Fares Akram contributed reporting from Gaza.

lead_paragraph: Responding to the discovery, the Israeli military said it had suspended the flow of building materials into Gaza because the tunnel could have been used for an attack against soldiers or civilians.

headline.main: Tunnel Found From Gaza Into Israel, Military Says
headline.print_headline: Tunnel Found From Gaza Into Israel, Military Says
